changeSet.author: MineStar

preConditions.onFailMessage: Ignored AddColumn for FILEIMPORTTIME_UTC to table HEALTH_LOG as table does not exist or column already exists.

changeSet.comment: HLT-1327 Add file import timestamp to HEALTH_LOG table

column.name: FILEIMPORTTIME_UTC
column.remarks: which is populated with the current UTC date and time when a file is imported.
